title: Smite 2 Tier List
description: Discover the ultimate Smite 2 Tier List based on votes from the community. Explore rankings for top gods across S, A, B, C, and D Tiers to find the best gods in the game.
heading: Smite 2 Tier List
introText: Discover the ultimate Smite 2 Tier List based on votes from the community. Explore rankings for top gods across S, A, B, C, and D Tiers to find the best gods in the game.

data.itemDescription: Offers healing and utility, but can be vulnerable to burst damage

A revered figure from Korean shamanism, Princess Bari is known for her healing abilities and her role as a guide for souls transitioning to the afterlife, embodying themes of perseverance and redemption
The Japanese sun goddess, Amaterasu excels as a melee warrior, utilizing her radiant auras to enhance allies' combat capabilities and sustain herself during battles
Offers unique mobility and crowd control, making him a formidable opponent
A legendary Greek hero, Hercules is a formidable warrior known for his immense strength, durability, and crowd control abilities, making him a dominant presence on the battlefield
As the Greek goddess of the hunt, Artemis is a ranged hunter who employs traps and a powerful ultimate to control enemies and deal significant damage from a distance
The famed Greek warrior of the Trojan War, Achilles is a versatile fighter who can adapt his combat style by choosing between armored resilience and unarmored agility

The Norse sun goddess, Sol is a mage who harnesses solar energy to deal sustained magical damage, with abilities that allow her to phase into a fiery incorporeal form, enhancing her mobility and survivability
Tanky support with displacement abilities, disrupting enemy formations
High burst damage mage, excelling in team fights with area damage
A stealthy killer with high explosive potential, effective in the right hands, but predictable
Powerful mage with area denial and sustained damage
High mobility and crowd control, making him a strong jungler
A swift Chinese hunter who excels at repositioning quickly after respawning, allowing her to return to battle with ease
A Celtic mage known for her deceptive abilities and unique power to transform into any other god on the battlefield
An Arthurian warrior fueled by wrath, wielding dual swords to deliver powerful melee attacks and abilities
A Mayan trickster and assassin who uses his agility and a powerful fear-inducing ultimate to disrupt enemies
A Yoruba guardian who utilizes flowing water abilities to heal allies and control the battlefield with barriers
High skill ceiling with powerful ranged attacks, excelling in the carry role
Tanky support with strong crowd control, but can be outmaneuvered
The formidable three-headed guardian of the Underworld, Cerberus excels at area control and inflicting damage over time with his poisonous breath and crowd control abilities
As the personification of death, Thanatos is a high-risk, high-reward assassin who can execute low-health enemies and sustain himself through life-stealing abilities
The Hindu god of fire, Agni is a dual-headed mage who utilizes fire-based abilities to deal sustained area damage and control the battlefield
The Roman god of the forge, Vulcan is a mage who deploys mechanical constructs and turrets to zone enemies and provide consistent damage output
The Mayan god of rain, Chaac is a durable warrior known for his area-of-effect abilities and sustain, making him a strong presence in solo lanes
The Gorgon from Greek mythology, Medusa is a hunter who combines high mobility with potent crowd control, including a petrifying gaze that can turn enemies to stone
Consistent damage dealer with healing abilities, suitable for various team compositions
The Greek god of the sea, Poseidon is a ranged mage who commands tidal forces to control the battlefield and unleash devastating area damage
An Egyptian guardian, Khepri uses his protective abilities to shield allies and can revive fallen teammates with his ultimate
The Greek god of the underworld, Hades is a mage who excels at area control and sustain, utilizing his dark powers to drain enemies' health
An Egyptian hunter, Neith combines ranged attacks with crowd control, using her spirit arrows and backflip to outmaneuver opponents
A Chinese mage, Nu Wa manipulates elemental forces to summon minions, create protective fog, and deal damage across the map
The Norse wolf god, Fenrir is a melee assassin who relies on his ferocity and leap attacks to hunt down and eliminate targets
The Greek goddess of wisdom, Athena is a guardian who excels in initiating fights and protecting allies with her defensive abilities
A Hindu hunter, Rama is a ranged physical damage dealer known for his precision shots and mobility, allowing him to excel in duels
The Polynesian goddess of volcanoes, Pele is a melee assassin who uses her fiery abilities to burst down enemies and escape danger
A Mayan assassin, Awilix is known for her high mobility and ability to capitalize on enemies' mispositioning with her mount and pull abilities
The Roman god of love, Cupid is a hunter who supports his team with healing and crowd control, charming enemies to disrupt their actions
An Arthurian mage, Merlin wields multiple elemental stances to adapt to various combat situations, offering versatility in his magical attacks
An Egyptian hunter known for his powerful ranged attacks and crowd control abilities, making him a formidable presence on the battlefield
A Japanese hunter who utilizes her spectral sickles to deal damage to enemies both when thrown and upon return, excelling in wave clear and sustained damage
A Celtic hunter with the unique ability to switch between different seasonal effects on his basic attacks, allowing for versatile combat strategies
A Mayan guardian who uses his seismic powers to control the battlefield, creating tremors and walls to disrupt enemy movements
The Egyptian god of the dead, Anubis is a mage who channels powerful dark magic to deal high area damage, though he lacks mobility
A Japanese assassin known for his high mobility and burst damage, using his mastery over storms to swiftly eliminate targets
A Mayan mage who commands the power of wind to unleash devastating area attacks, controlling the battlefield with his tornadoes
A Voodoo mage who combines healing and damage, using his abilities to control enemies and support allies with his unique blend of powers
A Roman warrior who adapts to combat situations by switching between different weapons, each providing unique advantages in battle
A Japanese hunter and trickster tanuki who uses deception and explosive acorns to outmaneuver and damage his enemies
The Egyptian god of the earth, Geb is a guardian who protects allies with his stone shield and disrupts enemies with his seismic abilities
A versatile Chinese warrior who masterfully wields a sword, spear, and bow, allowing her to adapt to various combat situations with agility and precision
The Roman god of wine, Bacchus is a guardian who becomes more formidable as he drinks, using his intoxication to enhance his combat abilities
The Greek goddess of vengeance, Nemesis is an assassin who excels at punishing overextended enemies and reducing their defenses
The formidable Norse All-Father, Odin excels in initiating battles and controlling the battlefield with his Ring of Spears, preventing enemy escapes and healing within its bounds
The Greek god of war, Ares is a guardian who uses his chains to bind enemies and his ultimate to initiate powerful team fights
